IRootERC20Bridge","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes","name":"payload","type":"bytes"},{"internalType":"address","name":"refundRecipient","type":"address"}],"name":"sendMessage","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"payable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes4","name":"interfaceId","type":"bytes4"}],"name":"supportsInterface","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"newChildBridgeAdaptor","type":"string"}],"name":"updateChildBridgeAdaptor","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"newChildChain","type":"string"}],"name":"updateChildChain","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newGasService","type":"address"}],"name":"updateGasService","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newRootBridge","type":"address"}],"name":"updateRootBridge","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"The contract ensures that any delivered message originated from the registered child chain and bridge adapter contract on the child chain. It will reject all other messages.Features:      - Send messages to the child chain via the Axelar Gateway.      - Receive and validate messages from the child chain via the Axelar Gateway.      - Manage Role Based Access ControlRoles:      - An account with a BRIDGE_MANAGER_ROLE can update the root bridge address.      - An account with a TARGET_MANAGER_ROLE can update the child chain name and the child bridge adaptor address.      - An account with a GAS_SERVICE_MANAGER_ROLE can update the gas service address.      - An account with a DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE can grant and revoke roles.Note:      - This is an upgradeable contract that should be operated behind OpenZeppelin's TransparentUpgradeableProxy.      - The initialize function is susceptible to front running, so precautions should be taken to account for this scenario.","events":{"Initialized(uint8)":{"details":"Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized."},"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this. _Available since v3.1._"},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call, an admin role bearer except when using {AccessControl-_setupRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"constructor":{"params":{"_gateway":"The address of the Axelar gateway contract.","_initializerAddress":"The address of the authorized initializer."}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"initialize((address,address,address,address),address,string,string,address)":{"params":{"_adaptorRoles":"Struct containing addresses of roles.","_childBridgeAdaptor":"Address of the bridge adaptor on the child chain.","_childChainId":"Axelar's ID for the child chain.","_gasService":"Address of Axelar Gas Service contract.","_rootBridge":"Address of root bridge contract."}},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"sendMessage(bytes,address)":{"details":"The function is `payable` because the message passing protocol may require a fee to be paid.","params":{"payload":"The message to send, encoded in a `bytes` array.","refundRecipient":"Used if the message passing protocol requires fees & pays back excess to a refund recipient."}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"updateChildBridgeAdaptor(string)":{"details":"Can only be called by TARGET_MANAGER_ROLE.","params":{"newChildBridgeAdaptor":"address of the new child bridge adaptor."}},"updateChildChain(string)":{"details":"Can only be called by TARGET_MANAGER_ROLE.","params":{"newChildChain":"Name of new child chain."}},"updateGasService(address)":{"details":"Can only be called by GAS_SERVICE_MANAGER_ROLE.","params":{"newGasService":"Address of new gas service."}},"updateRootBridge(address)":{"details":"Can only be called by BRIDGE_MANAGER_ROLE.","params":{"newRootBridge":"Address of new root bridge."}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"CallerNotBridge()":[{"notice":"Error when the contract calling the adaptor is not the bridge."}],"InvalidChildBridgeAdaptor()":[{"notice":"Error when the given child chain bridge adaptor is invalid."}],"InvalidChildChain()":[{"notice":"Error when a message is to be sent to a child chain that isn't valid."}],"InvalidSourceAddress()":[{"notice":"Error when a message received has invalid source address."}],"InvalidSourceChain()":[{"notice":"Error when a message received has invalid source chain."}],"NoGas()":[{"notice":"Error when no gas (in the form of `msg.value`) is given to the transaction to pay for Axelar message passing."}],"UnauthorizedInitializer()":[{"notice":"Error when the an unauthorized initializer tries to initialize the contract."}],"UnsupportedOperation()":[{"notice":"Error when a function that isn't supported by the adaptor is called."}],"ZeroAddresses()":[{"notice":"Error when a zero address is given when not valid."}]},"events":{"AdaptorExecute(string,string,bytes)":{"notice":"Emitted when an Axelar message is received from the child chain."},"AxelarMessageSent(string,string,bytes)":{"notice":"Emitted when an Axelar message is sent to the child chain."},"ChildBridgeAdaptorUpdated(string,string)":{"notice":"Emitted when the child chain bridge adaptor is updated."},"ChildChainUpdated(string,string)":{"notice":"Emitted when the child chain name is updated."},"GasServiceUpdated(address,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when the gas service is updated."},"RootBridgeUpdated(address,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when the root bridge is updated."}},"kind":"user","methods":{"BRIDGE_MANAGER_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role identifier for those who can update the bridge used by the adaptor."},"GAS_SERVICE_MANAGER_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role identifier for those who can update the gas service used by the adaptor."},"TARGET_MANAGER_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role identifier for those who can update targeted bridge used by the adaptor (e.g. target is child chain on root adaptors)."},"childBridgeAdaptor()":{"notice":"Address of the bridge adaptor on the child chain, which this contract will communicate with."},"childChainId()":{"notice":"Axelar's ID for the child chain. Axelar uses the chain name as the chain ID."},"constructor":{"notice":"Constructs the RootAxelarBridgeAdaptor contract."},"gasService()":{"notice":"Address of the Axelar Gas Service contract."},"grantBridgeManagerRole(address)":{"notice":"Function to grant bridge manager role to an address"},"grantGasServiceManagerRole(address)":{"notice":"Function to grant gas service manager role to an address"},"grantTargetManagerRole(address)":{"notice":"Function to grant target manager role to an address"},"initialize((address,address,address,address),address,string,string,address)":{"notice":"Initialization function for RootAxelarBridgeAdaptor."},"initializerAddress()":{"notice":"Address of the authorized initializer."},"revokeBridgeManagerRole(address)":{"notice":"Function to revoke bridge manager role from an address"},"revokeGasServiceManagerRole(address)":{"notice":"Function to revoke gas service manager role from an address"},"revokeTargetManagerRole(address)":{"notice":"Function to target manager role from an address"},"rootBridge()":{"notice":"Address of the bridge contract on the root chain."},"sendMessage(bytes,address)":{"notice":"Send an arbitrary message to the child chain via the message passing protocol."},"updateChildBridgeAdaptor(string)":{"notice":"Update the child chain bridge adaptor address"},"updateChildChain(string)":{"notice":"Update the child chain name."},"updateGasService(address)":{"notice":"Update the gas service."},"updateRootBridge(address)":{"notice":"Update the root bridge"}},"notice":"Facilitates communication between the RootERC20Bridge and the Axelar core contracts, to send and receive messages to and from the child params._gateway: The address of the Axelar gateway contract.
params._initializerAddress: The address of the authorized initializer.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

params._childBridgeAdaptor: Address of the bridge adaptor on the child chain.
params._childChainId: Axelar's ID for the child chain.
params._gasService: Address of Axelar Gas Service contract.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

sendMessage(bytes,address).details: The function is `payable` because the message passing protocol may require a fee to be paid.

params.payload: The message to send, encoded in a `bytes` array.
params.refundRecipient: Used if the message passing protocol requires fees & pays back excess to a refund recipient.

updateChildBridgeAdaptor(string).details: Can only be called by TARGET_MANAGER_ROLE.

params.newChildBridgeAdaptor: address of the new child bridge adaptor.

updateChildChain(string).details: Can only be called by TARGET_MANAGER_ROLE.

updateGasService(address).details: Can only be called by GAS_SERVICE_MANAGER_ROLE.

updateRootBridge(address).details: Can only be called by BRIDGE_MANAGER_ROLE.

BRIDGE_MANAGER_ROLE().notice: Role identifier for those who can update the bridge used by the adaptor.

GAS_SERVICE_MANAGER_ROLE().notice: Role identifier for those who can update the gas service used by the adaptor.

TARGET_MANAGER_ROLE().notice: Role identifier for those who can update targeted bridge used by the adaptor (e.g. target is child chain on root adaptors).

childBridgeAdaptor().notice: Address of the bridge adaptor on the child chain, which this contract will communicate with.

childChainId().notice: Axelar's ID for the child chain. Axelar uses the chain name as the chain ID.

gasService().notice: Address of the Axelar Gas Service contract.

grantBridgeManagerRole(address).notice: Function to grant bridge manager role to an address

grantGasServiceManagerRole(address).notice: Function to grant gas service manager role to an address

grantTargetManagerRole(address).notice: Function to grant target manager role to an address

revokeBridgeManagerRole(address).notice: Function to revoke bridge manager role from an address

revokeGasServiceManagerRole(address).notice: Function to revoke gas service manager role from an address

revokeTargetManagerRole(address).notice: Function to target manager role from an address

rootBridge().notice: Address of the bridge contract on the root chain.

sendMessage(bytes,address).notice: Send an arbitrary message to the child chain via the message passing protocol.

updateChildBridgeAdaptor(string).notice: Update the child chain bridge adaptor address
